name: Long Night of Christmas
description:
The Lord of Halloween, Alucard, has come up with his latest evil plan: turn Christmas into Halloween! 
He intends to start of with the small village of Mudamura. Now, it's up to you to stop him and his minions. Form a contract with an (castaway) Angel, gather your strength and save Christmas in this turn based RPG!

This game is still in development.

Current version - Alpha 0.001

----

The magical contract with the Angel will grant you magic, of course! Battle your away through the levels and power up as you beat the evil minions and acquire some useful skills! Use the Angel's power to bring in the pain to Alucard.

Rejoice as you won't be alone in this quest. Four other heroes will stand by your side as you fight to save Christmas!
-Suzuha: - Clever and mysterious girl, who's eager to fight and gather spoils.
-Yoshii: Posh, arrogant kid who studies abroad. Usually a "nice" guy to be around.
-Kido: A useless waiter. Doesn't do anything well. Better off as bait or cannon fodder, during fights!
-Miho: Token girl with glasses who loves magical girl themed stuff and being isolated in her room being "productive" - by watching anime...

Fight witches, werewolves, jack o' lanterns and other monsters as you make your way to the ultimate challenge: Alucard himself! Beat this wretched vampire and save Christmas!

Now go have fun ruining that vampire's plans!
